+000013c0: 7274 6172 204d 6179 6865 6d20 6368 616c  rtar Mayhem chal
+000013d0: 6c65 6e67 6573 2074 6865 2061 6765 6e74  lenges the agent
+000013e0: 2077 6974 6820 6120 7365 7175 656e 6365   with a sequence
+000013f0: 206f 6620 636f 6d6d 616e 6473 2074 6861   of commands tha
+00001400: 7420 7468 6520 6167 656e 7420 6861 7320  t the agent has 
+00001410: 746f 206d 656d 6f72 697a 6520 616e 6420  to memorize and 
+00001420: 6578 6563 7574 6520 696e 2074 6865 2072  execute in the r
+00001430: 6967 6874 206f 7264 6572 2e20 4475 7269  ight order. Duri
+00001440: 6e67 2074 6865 2062 6567 696e 6e69 6e67  ng the beginning
+00001450: 206f 6620 7468 6520 6570 6973 6f64 652c   of the episode,
+00001460: 2065 6163 6820 636f 6d6d 616e 6420 6973   each command is
+00001470: 2076 6973 7561 6c69 7a65 6420 6f6e 6520   visualized one 
+00001480: 6279 206f 6e65 2e20 4d6f 7274 6172 204d  by one. Mortar M
+00001490: 6179 6865 6d20 6361 6e20 6265 2072 6564  ayhem can be red
+000014a0: 7563 6564 2074 6f20 736f 6c65 6c79 2065  uced to solely e
+000014b0: 7865 6375 7469 6e67 2063 6f6d 6d61 6e64  xecuting command
+000014c0: 732e 2049 6e20 7468 6973 2063 6173 652c  s. In this case,
+000014d0: 2074 6865 2063 6f6d 6d61 6e64 2073 6571   the command seq
+000014e0: 7565 6e63 6520 6973 2061 6c77 6179 7320  uence is always 
+000014f0: 6176 6169 6c61 626c 6520 6173 2076 6563  available as vec
+00001500: 746f 7220 6f62 7365 7276 6174 696f 6e20  tor observation 
+00001510: 286f 6e65 2d68 6f74 2065 6e63 6f64 6564  (one-hot encoded
+00001520: 2920 616e 642c 2074 6865 7265 666f 7265  ) and, therefore
+00001530: 2c20 6973 206e 6f74 2076 6973 7561 6c69  , is not visuali
+00001540: 7a65 642e 0d0a 0d0a 5468 6520 6d61 7820  zed.....The max 
+00001550: 6c65 6e67 7468 206f 6620 616e 2065 7069  length of an epi
+00001560: 736f 6465 2063 616e 2062 6520 6361 6c63  sode can be calc
+00001570: 756c 6174 6564 2061 7320 666f 6c6c 6f77  ulated as follow
+00001580: 733a 0d0a 0d0a 6060 600d 0a6d 6178 2065  s:....```..max e
+00001590: 7069 736f 6465 206c 656e 6774 6820 3d20  pisode length = 
+000015a0: 2863 6f6d 6d61 6e64 5f73 686f 775f 6475  (command_show_du

     def _process_spawn_pos(self, spawn_pos, offset = 30):
+        """Process the spawn position to ensure it remains within the game screen boundaries.
+
+        Arguments:
+            spawn_pos {tuple} -- The original spawn position as a tuple (x, y).
+            offset {int} -- The offset distance from the screen boundary. Default is 30.
+
+        Returns:
+            {tuple} -- The processed spawn position ensuring it is within the screen boundaries.
+        """
         x = spawn_pos[0]
         y = spawn_pos[1]
         offset = int(offset * SCALE)
         if x < offset:
             x = offset
         elif x > self.screen_dim - offset:
             x = self.screen_dim - offset
         if y < offset:
             y = offset
         elif y > self.screen_dim - offset:
             y = self.screen_dim - offset
         return (x, y)

             coin = Coin(self.reset_params["coin_scale"], spawn_pos)
             coin.draw(self.coin_surface)
             self.coins.append(coin)
